Text:
Thanks, but when the category says FLAC, that means the files should be in FLAC format.

The category isn't LOSSLESS, meaning you can post m4a or APE or any lossless format you want.

It's a helluva lot easier for the uploader to convert their files to FLAC before uploading, than it is for hundreds of downloaders to do it later.

I do, too, prefer flac. On the other hand, if you do the converting yourself, you know it's done right.
Frankly, I would like the categori to be just - lossless :-)
